Comment: Хайпожор, который хотел украсть чужую славу и отвлечь внимание прессы от призеров Олимпиады. На самом деле первый исполнитель 4 акселя - Артур Дмитриев, он его прыгал еще в 2018 году. И еще раз прыгнул на Чемпионате Америки 2021. А еще в инстаграме Марк Кондратюк прыгает пятерной сальхов, тоже с падением.

Video Caption: Beijing 2022| Fans of Japan's figure skating star Yuzuru Hanyu excited to see him in Beijing 羽生結弦
Comment:
Many athletes have Olympic gold, but those who really saw a worldwide fever are rare; In figure skating I believe that Katarine Witt \Yuna Kim\ Plushenko have achieved this. But I don't see anything similar to Yuzumania, which hit the world in Sochi 2014 and even after 8 years, yuzumania is still going strong, conquering more and more public. Yuzuru Hanyu's power is inexplicable and he doesn't even try to be famous, he doesn't use social media and he doesn't like the celebrity status, he is so embarrassed to always be the center of attention before the other skaters.
 I love Yuzu, Fanyu forever
